data.text: @11Raych @VicGovDH You can see here that the correlation between price and performance is not tight. There are some significantly more affordable & high performance options available. People walk past this not realising it’s almost twice the performance at half the price of the device on it’s left https://t.co/yZnaa46Hlq https://t.co/qh4vgoDXoy
@VicGovDH But keep your masks on and be locked up inside so you can't breathe any of it. You people are a pathetic joke.
@VicGovDH And if your workplace refuses to do this? Back to work recommendations aren’t the way out of this
@VicGovDH Show some innovation! At the very least look to other countries who are doing it better. We're missing an opportunity to show some leadership here.

@VicGovDH It's a good message, why not provide more support for people who can't afford air purifiers? You could also be more on the front foot with providing guidance and significant rebates for industries. Why not install free c02 monitors?
@VicGovDH Is @VicGovDoT implementing HEPA filtration, UV purification, increased fresh air circulation, etc on public transport like other cities around the world?
@VicGovDH Then put a mask on for 2 & half years.
